TimeDependent Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for TimeDependent:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Time dependent objects.

All objects which depend on time, especially on the size of the simulation time, must derive from this class.

Public Member Functions

 TimeDependent (const class Time *time)
 Construct.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TimeDependent::TimeDependent ( const class Time *  time  )  [inline]

Construct.

Parameters:
time Time object on which this object is dependent If 0 is given here, a new time object with time step dt=1.0 will be created. In this case the object will be independent of all changes made to the time settings otherwise in the program. This must only be used for objects, which are not dependent on the current time settings, but inherit from this class anyway (some special forms of Stochastic variables, like Product).
